DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate scintigraphic methods as objective factors for functional outcome in patients treated with ileal-pouch-anal anastomosis (IPAA). The gastrointestinal transit-time and the degree of evacuation are evaluated in relation to the functional outcome.
DOC.brief_title: Scintigraphic Evaluation of IPAA Function in Patients With Ulcerative Colitis
